reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love these dryer sheets. They are compact, ecofriendly, easy to use, and smell great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars very easy to use and cleans great
reviews.reviewText: I liked the ease of using the sheets . Just drop in the washer and add clothes. Also the container is lightweight and easy to handle. I was very satisfied with the end result very good cleaning and scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Gets the job done
reviews.reviewText: I switched to Earth Breeze because it is better for the environment. I decided I didn’t want to contribute to the plastic waste if I don’t have to. It leaves my clothes clean with a light scent. My towels seem pretty soft without using softener. Our only complaint was that it didn’t always dissolve well when we put it in the washing machine drum. To fix that, we now put it in the dispenser. So far it dissolves completely when we put it in the dispenser. I haven’t had to wash out any stains yet so, I’m not sure how it will do with stain fighting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I will never go back to powdered laundry detergent!
reviews.reviewText: Eco-friendly laundry sheets are a game-changer for those seeking a greener approach to laundry care. These sheets typically come in a compact, sheet-like form and are designed to be eco-conscious from production to use.One of the most significant advantages of these sheets is their environmental impact. They often require less water and energy to produce compared to traditional liquid or powder detergents. They come in recyclable or compostable packaging, reducing plastic waste. Additionally, they're lightweight, which can save on transportation emissions.Using eco-friendly laundry sheets is a breeze. You simply toss one sheet into the washing machine with your clothes, and it dissolves during the wash cycle, releasing the detergent. This simplicity makes them ideal for anyone looking to simplify their laundry routine.These sheets are often formulated with biodegradable and non-toxic ingredients, making them safe for the environment and sensitive skin. They are also free from harsh chemicals like phosphates and sulfates, reducing the risk of skin irritation and allergies.However, it's essential to note that the effectiveness of these sheets may vary depending on your water quality and laundry load. Some users may find them less effective on tough stains or heavily soiled items, so pretreating stains may be necessary in some cases.In summary, eco-friendly laundry sheets are a commendable choice for individuals looking to reduce their environmental footprint while doing laundry. They offer convenience, sustainability, and gentleness on the skin. While they may not be a one-size-fits-all solution for every laundry need, they are a step in the right direction toward more sustainable and eco-conscious laundry practices.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quick and Easy! No more mess or too-strong odor.
reviews.reviewText: I waited 3 months to review since I wasn't sure how these would hold up to a big variety of laundry situations. Now we've had a chance to use them on everything from very soiled stuff to just regular daily laundry. WE LOVE THEM! Easy to use, no big plastic jug that is messy and takes longer to use. They're great, you can choose between a half-sheet to 1+ for bigger jobs. We've never seen them leave pieces or bits that didn't dissolve. These sheets are our new go-to for daily laundry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I LOVE THIS PRODUCT!
reviews.reviewText: What a great value for a great product. My husband and I have jobs where we work outside in florida. I'm personally in construction. These laundry sheets clean perfectly. Sweat, concrete, dirt, food, you name it. Better than any liquid detergent and the 200 loads last a really long time. I'm still on my first box and will buy another as soon as I run low. I'm allergic to fragrance so these are perfect for my sensitive skin. My husband adds sented bead to his loads and we're both happy with every wash. Plus they take up no space and I don't have to get rid of big plastic jugs. 10 out of 10, highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I've only tried this once as far, but the laundry sheet seemed to clean and dissolve well. I like the scent- pleasant but not too strong. I haven't worn any clothes washed with this detergent yet.I love that it's so compact and we're not using plastic containers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love these easy to use laundry sheets!
reviews.reviewText: I tried these a year or so ago to see if they lived up to the hype. They do! I took over the laundry from my wife who had always used Tide. I remember throwing the big bulky plastic containers in the trash for many years. Now, I just reordered with a box of 100 sheets, good for up to two hundred loads as the sheets can be torn in half for smaller loads.As a widower, I pretty much only have smaller loads...I love getting the scent free version, as I like not smelling like perfume.I have found the sheets work well on light dirt and the heavy dirt I sometimes have after hunting or hiking. I highly recommend these easy to use sheets.Oh, yeah, I appreciate the good for the environment stuff, but really, I actually care about the ease and convenience of using these great for the environment sheets. If they were hard to use, I would probably wimp out and keep using the now unused half container of Tide.
